channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Federal Reserve is set to cut interest rates again as post-election uncertainty grows
item.description: Federal Reserve officials are poised Thursday to reduce their key interest rate for a second straight time, responding to a steady slowdown of the inflation pressures that exasperated many Americans and contributed to Donald Trumpâ€™s presidential election victory.

item.title: Man who used legal loophole to live rent-free for years in NYC hotel found unfit to stand trial
item.description: A man charged with fraud for claiming to own a storied Manhattan hotel where he had been living rent-free for years has been found unfit to stand trial.

item.title: Free pizza and a DJ help defrost Montana voters lined up until 4 a.m. in the snow to vote
item.description: Waiting to vote tested the willpower of hundreds of people in an hourslong line that stretched outside a county courthouse in a Montana town.
